mapper.sql: id, url, path, component, name, iconCls AS iconCls, keepAlive AS keepAlive, requireAuth AS requireAuth, parentId AS parentId, enabled, create_time
mapper.select: SELECT m.*, r.id as id1, r.`name` as name1 FROM menu m LEFT JOIN menu_role mr ON mr.mid = m.id LEFT JOIN role r ON mr.rid = r.id

SELECT men1.*, menu2.id as id1, menu2.url as url1, menu2.name as name1, menu2.parentid as parentid1, menu2.path as path1, menu2.component as component1 FROM menu men1, menu menu2 WHERE men1.id = menu2.parentId AND menu2.id IN ( SELECT mr.mid FROM menu_role mr, user_role ur, user u WHERE mr.rid = ur.rid AND ur.uid = u.id AND u.username = #{username} ) and men1.parentid =1 and men1.enabled =1

SELECT menu1.*,menu2.id as id1, menu2.url as url1, menu2.name as name1, menu2.parentid as parentid1, menu2.path as path1, menu2.component as component1 FROM menu as menu1,menu as menu2 WHERE menu1.id=menu2.parentId AND menu2.id IN (SELECT mr.mid FROM menu_role mr,user_role ur,role r WHERE mr.rid=ur.rid and ur.rid= r.id ) AND menu1.parentId=1 AND menu2.enabled=1
